data.quote: If you want to succeed you should strike out on new paths, rather than travel the worn paths of accepted success.
data.author: John D. Rockefeller

data.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: The will to succeed is important, but what's more important is the will to prepare.
data.author: Bobby Knight

data.quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.
data.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

data.quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
data.author: Aristotle
